      • error

        public static void error(org.bukkit.command.CommandSender sender,
                         java.lang.Throwable err,
                         java.lang.String plugin,
                         java.lang.String author)
        Sends an error report to the given sender and to console. The report only includes the stack trace parts, which contains the authors name
        Parameters:
        sender - - The CommandSender who should receive the error report
        err - - The error
        plugin - - The plugin where the error appeared
        author - - The author name, which will be searched in the error report

        Parameters:
        plr - the UUID of the online/offline player
        Returns:
